ovdesc.p: This table is updated when a new draft is issued via TELLER, FUNDS.TRANSFER

desc.p: This field displays a date when the cheque/draft is stopped.
This field displays the number of times the cheque is presented.
This field holds the status of the draft/cheque.
Allows any of the following values: ISSUED, PRESENTED, CLEARED, EXCEPTION, UNKNOWN, CANCELLED, STOPPED and RETURNED or EXPIRED.
This field holds the name of the Payee as mentioned in the Draft/cheque.
This field displays the account number of draft/cheque.
This field holds the issue date of draft/cheque.
This field displays the cheque type of draft/cheque.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field gets updated when supplement is updated from the field PAYMENT.STOP . It displays a reason for Payment Stop request.
This field holds the currency of the draft/cheque.
Allows valid currency from CURRENCY table.
The ID is formed with the following components <cheque-type>.<account-number>.<cheque/draft-number>
This field displays the remarks of Payment Stop.
This field displays the transaction reference of the originating application.
This field displays the application name through which the draft is issued.
Value of this field indicates whether the supplement is updated manually or by the system.
Holds the value SYSTEM or MANUAL.
This field displays the amount from when the Payment Stop is effective.
This field holds the draft/cheque amount.
This field displays the amount until when the Payment Stop is effective.
This field displays the payee's name.
This field displays the presented date of customer cheque.
This field displays the cheque number of draft/cheque.
